attributes.action: Canterbury & Hernebay revoke payment to use the seafront ramps for watercrafts
attributes.additional_details: we would like help with stopping the local council charging the general public for use and right of access to the sea with their water crafts .
attributes.background: there was a meeting held without public notice while covid 19 has been around so that on-one could object to this alas nobody could air the public's views in

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
